00009 #if !defined(Mmi_CameraSettings_hpp)
00010 #define Mmi_CameraSettings_hpp
00011 
00012 /*  
00013     This class exists only to provide an interface with the Apoxi/StillCamera class.
00014 
00015     This allows us to put the functionality in another class without having to clutter 
00016     up the CameraApp class. All functions directly/indirectly call the interfaces provided
00017     by CameraInterface.hpp file. As a result, all the functions of this class are public.
00018 
00019     There is one member variable that is aa reference to the StillCamera class. This is because
00020     it would be easier to store the reference once than to make function calls to retrieve the 
00021     reference (either from CameraApp or from DeviceManager) everytime it has to be used.
00022 */
00023 class CameraSettings 
00024 {
00025     
00026 public:
00027     
00028     //Not really needed, just for debug info
00029     CameraSettings();
00030 
00031     //Not really needed, but just there for completeness
00032     ~CameraSettings();
00033 
00034     BOOLEAN                 Init(StillCamera* stillcamera_ref, UINT8 display_idx);
00035 
00036     BOOLEAN                 SetBrightness(INT brightness);
00037     INT                     GetBrightness() const;
00038 
00039     BOOLEAN                 SetContrast(INT contrast);
00040     INT                     GetContrast() const;
00041 
00042     BOOLEAN                 SetZoom(Camera::ActionType zoom);
00043     INT                     GetZoom() const;    //Not supported by Apoxi yet
00044 
00045     BOOLEAN                 SetImageSize(Camera::ImageSizeType size);
00046     Camera::ImageSizeType   GetImageSize() const;
00047 
00048     BOOLEAN                 SetFlash(StillCamera::FlashType flash);
00049     StillCamera::FlashType      GetFlash() const;
00050     
00051     BOOLEAN                 SetAntiFlicker(Camera::AntiFlickerType antiflicker);
00052     Camera::AntiFlickerType GetAntiFlicker() const;
00053 
00054     BOOLEAN                 SetWhiteBalance(Camera::WhiteBalanceType wb);
00055     //WhiteBalanceType      GetWhiteBalance();  //Not supported by the interface right now
00056   
00057     BOOLEAN                 SetTwilight(Camera::TwilightType twilight);
00058     Camera::TwilightType        GetTwilight() const;
00059     
00060      BOOLEAN                SetJPEGQuality(INT quality);
00061      INT                                GetJPEGQuality() const;
00062 
00063      BOOLEAN                    SetTransformation(Camera::TransformationType transType);
00064      Camera::TransformationType GetTransformation() const; 
00065 
00066      BOOLEAN                SetFilter(Camera::FilterType filter);
00067      Camera::FilterType     GetFilter() const;
00068 
00069 
00070 
00071 private:
00072     StillCamera*    m_camera_ref;
00073     INT             m_zoom_level;
00074     UINT8           m_display_idx;
00075 };
